contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 4, 1977 D Huddersfield & District BBA Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Best player - John Roberts,(euphonium) Slaithwaite. Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £20, 3rd £15. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 7, 2013, 8:01 a.m. June 22, 2016, 9:21 a.m.
1 Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths Rhapsody in Brass
2 Hade Edge Jack Fisher James Cook, Circumnavigator
3 Slaithwaite Band Peter Wadsworth Symphony of Marches
4 Linthwaite Silver Band Herbert H. Howarth The Three Musketeers
Withdrawn Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Unknown
